identificationModule.briefTitle: Impact of Outreach on Medicaid Enrollment
identificationModule.officialTitle: Outreach and Maintenance of Medicaid Enrollment: Evidence From Wisconsin's Navigator Program

descriptionModule.briefSummary: This project will assess the impact of various forms of outreach from navigators on Medicaid enrollment. Navigators are professionals who can provide one-on-one assistance with the Medicaid renewal process. The investigators propose to randomize the nature of outreach to households in Wisconsin enrolled in fee-for-service Medicaid who must renew or lose their coverage.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription:
During the COVID-19 public health emergency, states received support to maintain continuous Medicaid coverage, raising Medicaid enrollment to unprecedented levels. In Wisconsin, enrollment was nearly 30% higher by the end of 2021 compared to February 2020, with the maintenance of enrollment policy contributing to much of this increase. After the end of the public health emergency, normal renewal processes will resume.

The Wisconsin navigator program, Covering Wisconsin, has been commissioned by the Department of Health Services (DHS) to conduct outreach to the group of fee-for-service Medicaid beneficiaries who need to re-determine eligibility after the conclusion of the public health emergency. To identify what outreach strategies are most effective, the investigators propose to randomize the nature of outreach used. While there will be some variation in the content and timing of messages, all beneficiaries will receive messages with clear information on how to contact the navigators.

Per a protocol amendment approved on 2/21/24, the study team will no longer randomize receipt of an outbound call but rather will provide it to all participants.

designInfo.interventionModelDescription: The nature of the intervention will be randomized to participants.

armGroups.label: Outreach via Postcard + Outbound Call
armGroups.description: Outreach via postcard, plus placed an outbound phone call from navigators (20% of sample)

armGroups.label: Outreach via Text Message Encouraging Call to Hotline
armGroups.description: Outreach via text message encouraging a call to a hotline for assistance (15% of sample)

armGroups.label: Outreach via Text Message Encouraging Call to Hotline + Outbound Call
armGroups.description: Outreach via text message encouraging a call to a hotline for assistance, plus outbound phone call from navigators (7.5% of sample)

armGroups.label: Outreach via Text Message Encouraging Text Reply To Connect with Navigators
armGroups.description: Outreach via text message encouraging a text reply to connect with navigators via chatbot (15% of sample)

armGroups.label: Outreach via Text Message Encouraging Text Reply To Connect with Navigators + Outbound Call
armGroups.description: Outreach via text message encouraging a text reply to connect with navigators via chatbot, plus an outbound phone call from navigators (7.5% of sample)

armGroups.label: Outreach via Text Message Encouraging a Call to a Hotline for Assistance + a Reminder Message
armGroups.description: Outreach via text message encouraging a call to a hotline for assistance plus a similar reminder message two weeks later (15% of sample)

armGroups.label: Outreach Text Message Encouraging Call a Hotline for Assistance + Reminder Message
armGroups.description: Outreach via text message encouraging a call to a hotline for assistance plus a similar reminder message two weeks later + outbound call (7.5% of sample)

armGroups.label: Outreach via Text Message Encouraging Text Reply To Connect with Navigators+ a Reminder Message
armGroups.description: Outreach via text message encouraging a text reply to connect with navigators via chatbot plus a similar reminder message two weeks later (15% of sample)

armGroups.label: Outreach via Text Message Encouraging Reply To Connect with Navigators + Reminder Message
armGroups.description: Outreach via text message encouraging a text reply to connect with navigators via chatbot plus a similar reminder message two weeks later + outbound call (7.5% of sample)

interventions.name: Outreach From Navigators
interventions.description: Navigators are professionals who can provide one-on-one assistance with the Medicaid renewal process. The nature of the outreach will be randomized to participants.
armGroupLabels: Outreach Text Message Encouraging Call a Hotline for Assistance + Reminder Message
Outreach via Text Message Encouraging Call to Hotline
Outreach via Text Message Encouraging Call to Hotline + Outbound Call
Outreach via Text Message Encouraging Reply To Connect with Navigators + Reminder Message
Outreach via Text Message Encouraging Text Reply To Connect with Navigators
Outreach via Text Message Encouraging Text Reply To Connect with Navigators + Outbound Call
Outreach via Text Message Encouraging Text Reply To Connect with Navigators+ a Reminder Message
Outreach via Text Message Encouraging a Call to a Hotline for Assistance + a Reminder Message

primaryOutcomes.measure: Number of Participants Who Renew Medicaid Coverage

otherOutcomes.measure: Number of Participants Who Submit an Application to Renew Medicaid Coverage
Number of Participants for Whom Application to Renew Medicaid Coverage is Denied for Administrative Reasons
Demographics of People who Renew Medicaid Coverage
otherOutcomes.description: The investigators will measure the characteristics of people who renew medicaid coverage, including baseline income, race/ethnicity, and language preference.

otherOutcomes.measure: Number of Participants Responding 'DONE' to Text Message Outreach
Survey of Participants Who Received an Outbound Call Reported in Count of Participants
otherOutcomes.description: People who received an outbound call will be asked whether they finished an application to renew their coverage or receive new coverage, and whether they received a text message or postcard with a reminder and information about how to get help.

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Included on the lists Wisconsin DHS provides to Covering Wisconsin of fee-for-service Medicaid beneficiaries who need to renew their Medicaid coverage

Exclusion Criteria:

* Prefer a language other than English or Spanish or lack a cellular phone number

overallOfficials.name: Rebecca Myerson, MPH, PhD
overallOfficials.affiliation: UW-Madison School of Medicine and Public Health
